metadata.name: Moon and two peaks #1
metadata.description:
Robot Taekwon V, a comical hero once loved by most South Korean children, reappears as a figure representing people whose dreams have either disappeared or retired in age in Seong Tae-jinâ€™s universe. Via his hero who always dreams of a brighter world without losing hope, the artist depicts a black comedy that everyone can relate to one way or another.  

#NFTart   #Taekwon V  #Moon  #physical-based
